Embed Adjustments

by SlRvb

Inspired by Lithou’s Image Flags

Position

|| —|—| left | Move embed to left of page right | Move embed to right of page center | Center embed on page (text will not wrap)

Link Adjustments

   
nlk Hide Link
lk-l Move link to the left
lk-clear Set background color of link to clear

Heading/Title Adjustments

   
no-title Hide the page title of the embed
no-h Hide all heading in embed
(best for when using heading embeds)
n-h1 ― n-h6 Hide the heading specified

Sizing

Height | Width | % | —|—|—:| htiny | wtiny | 20 hsmall | wsmall | 30 hs-med | ws-med | 40 hm-sm | wm-sm | 50 hmed | wmed | 60 hm-tl | wm-tl | 80 htall | wtall | 95
